mapper.select: select * from device_trip where device_sn = #{deviceSn} and sta_time = #{staTime} order by sta_time desc limit 1

SELECT carDev.device_sn, car.lic_code, car.id as carId, etp.etp_name, suBrand.car_sub_brand , sum( TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, trip.sta_time, trip.end_time )) AS timeLong FROM car_info car LEFT JOIN car_device carDev ON car.id = carDev.car_id LEFT JOIN car_model model ON model.car_id = car.id LEFT JOIN car_sub_brand suBrand ON suBrand.id = model.sub_brand_id LEFT JOIN etp_info etp ON etp.id = car.etp_id LEFT JOIN device_trip trip on trip.device_sn =carDev.device_sn WHERE car.del_flag = 0
and car.etp_id=#{query.etpId}
and car.lic_code like concat('%',#{query.licCode},'%')
GROUP BY car.lic_code, car.id, carDev.device_sn, etp.etp_name, suBrand.car_sub_brand order by car.register_time ,car.id desc

SELECT trip.*, TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, trip.sta_time, trip.end_time ) AS timeLong FROM device_trip trip WHERE trip.device_sn = #{query.deviceSn}
and DAY(trip.end_time) = DAY(now())
and month(trip.end_time) = month(now())
and year(trip.end_time) = year(now())
and DAY(trip.end_time) = DAY(date_format(#{query.dayTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'))

SELECT -- sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, trip.sta_time, trip.end_time )) AS timeLong sum(mileage /1000) as timeLong FROM device_trip trip WHERE trip.device_sn = #{deviceSn}
and DATE_FORMAT( trip.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT( now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT( trip.end_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT( now(), '%Y-%m')
and DATE_FORMAT( trip.end_time, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT( now(), '%Y')
and DAY(trip.end_time) = DAY(date_format(#{dayTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'))

SELECT sum(mileage) as totoalMileage, sum( TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, sta_time, end_time )) as totoalLongTIme, sum( fuel_consumption ) as totoalFuelConsumption FROM device_trip where device_sn = #{deviceSn} and month(end_time) = month(#{monthTime})
SELECT day(end_time) as getTime, sum(mileage) as mileage FROM device_trip device_trip where device_sn = #{deviceSn} and month(end_time) = month(#{monthTime}) GROUP BY day(end_time)

SELECT day(end_time) as getTime, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF( HOUR, sta_time, end_time ))as longTime FROM device_trip where device_sn = #{deviceSn} and month(end_time) = month(#{monthTime}) GROUP BY day(end_time)
SELECT day(end_time) as getTime, sum(fuel_consumption) as fuelConsumption FROM device_trip where device_sn = #{deviceSn} and month(end_time) = month(#{monthTime}) GROUP BY day(end_time)
